mapper.select: SELECT /* Member.selectMember */ 회원일련번호 AS MEM_SNO, 회원아이디 AS MEM_ID, 회원비밀번호 AS MEM_PW, 시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, 시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(시스템생성일, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(시스템수정일, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT FROM META.TB001 WHERE 회원아이디 = #{memId}

SELECT /* Member.selectMemberAuthList */ 회원일련번호 AS MEM_SNO, 회원권한일련번호 AS MEM_AUTH_SNO, 회원아이디 AS MEM_ID, 회원권한 AS MEM_AUTH, 시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, 시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(시스템생성일, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(시스템수정일, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT FROM META.TB002 WHERE 회원아이디 = #{memId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO META.TB002 ( 회원일련번호 , 회원권한일련번호 , 회원아이디 , 회원권한 , 시스템생성자 , 시스템수정자 , 시스템생성일 , 시스템수정일 ) VALUES ( #{memSno} :: INTEGER , #{memAuthSno} :: INTEGER , #{memId} , #{memAuth} , #{sysCreator} , #{sysCreator} , now() , now() )
mapper.select: SELECT /* Member.selectMemberCnt */ count(1) AS CNT FROM META.TB001 WHERE 회원아이디 = #{memId}
